node.title: 2025-05-30 Radio Arcane
node.description:
Radio Arcane Presents: The Louisville Goth Prom featuring Feyleux

It's prom season! Join us for this year's Goth Prom with special guest Feyleux.
Brought to you by Radio Arcane, the Louisville Gothic forum, The Dark Market and Art Sanctuary.

The Nightmare continues on Friday, May 30th as Dead Of Night & The Dark Market keep up the monthly grind of dark eclectic music. Come out and help keep the dancefloor barely alive as we celebrate the glum drudgery of our dreadful existence.

This month will feature:

  • Feyleux
  • Radio Arcane Dark Music Specialists - DJ Count Grozny + Gothic Bastard + Motuvius Rex
  • Vending by the talented Dark Market.
  • Food Truck - TBA
  • Drinks by the enchanting Lany StarDust & Smooth T

18+
$15 Advanced tickets
$20 Day of show

node.title: 2025-06-27 Radio Arcane
node.displayName: Dead Of Night & The Dark Market - Midsummer feat. Sayryn
node.description:
Radio Arcane Presents Dead Of Night & The Dark Market - Midsummer, featuring Sayryn.
The Nightmare continues on Friday, June 27th as Dead Of Night & The Dark Market keep up the monthly grind of dark eclectic music. Come out and help keep the dancefloor barely alive as we celebrate the glum drudgery of our dreadful existence.

This month will feature:

  • Sayryn (Nashville) https://sayryn.com
  • Radio Arcane Dark Music Specialists - DJs Count Grozny, Gothic Bastard, Motuvius Rex
  • Vending by the talented Dark Market.
  • Food - The Gingerbread Hag
  • Drinks by the enchanting Lany StarDust & Smooth T

18+
$8 Advanced tickets
$12 Day of show

About the band -
Sayryn is a Nashville based duo that consists of Bryn Jahna and Saya. Both songwriters bring their unique styles to the group, taking on themes such as insecurity, growing up and relationships. Interweaving folk, rock and emo Sayryn creates a lush sound that's both haunting and reflective. The duo's influences are eclectic, ranging from Simon & Garfunkel, to the Cocteau Twins and Mistki. Their debut album "Cautionary Tales" was released in June 2024.

node.title: 20 : La Procesión de lo Infinitio
node.description: Twentieth episode of Radio Arcane with hosts Brian Drabant, Motuvius Rex and AndrOspore : Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio. We talk a bit about their history, process and life in their home city of Medellín, Colombia. Recorded from home studios as a production of Art Sanctuary in Louisville, KY.
node.shortDescription: Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio.
